CustomField.description:
SSSW - Shows the Customer type on Account
HIstory Gunith - When Case.Account is null, use the Contact to derive Account (PRB0049604)
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(AccountId)), IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.ServiceSLA__c))), TEXT(Account.ServiceSLA__c), IF ( Account.Role_Type_Roll_Up__c=="Customer", "Silver", "Consumer" ) ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact.Account.ServiceSLA__c))), TEXT(Contact.Account.ServiceSLA__c), IF ( Contact.Account.Role_Type_Roll_Up__c=="Customer", "Silver", "Consumer" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Customer Type
